Text.Page: The vampirs and Lok's cultists were producing dementaliths, the cause of the Mad Blood Disease. After learning of the existence of a production device, <PCNAME> decided to help Jelena break into the Sinestral Manor.

Duke Volperon always orders the count and countess to guard the entrance to the manor.

First, we need to locate the {@LinkObject:5#Countess's Coffin} and {@LinkObject:4#Count's Coffin} to get rid of them. Without them, the duke won't have a clue what's going on until we break into his manor."I'm on it."

I'll be {@linkcreature:216#1028#right outside Sinestral Manor} to see how things go.

Join me {@linkcreature:216#1028#there} after you take care of the count and countess.

You bled those blue-bloods? Well done.

I've got some bombs...and protection from that sanguine magic.

First to fight, first to drink! Let's go!
